title.name: Al-Hezmin's Crest
title.flavour text: He sought to be the best, but lost his family.

title.name: Baran's Crest
title.flavour text: He sought God, but lost himself.

title.name: Dedication to the Goddess
title.flavour text: Before the Goddess, nothing remains hidden. Adversity reveals old flaws and new strengths.

title.name: Divine Vessel
title.flavour text: Power is a curious thing.  It can be contained, hidden, locked away,  and yet it always breaks free.

title.name: Drox's Crest
title.flavour text: He sought a kingdom, but lost his people.

title.name: Eber's Key
title.flavour text: Mouth of the Masses, whose greatness spreads by our breath and touch, who feeds the starving with the starved, the strong with the weak.

title.name: Fragment of Constriction
title.flavour text: Webs are torn, not untangled.

title.name: Fragment of Emptiness
title.flavour text: What is not cannot cause harm.

title.name: Fragment of Enslavement
title.flavour text: Freedom is won, not given.

title.name: Fragment of Eradication
title.flavour text: Plagues are exhausted, not cured.

title.name: Fragment of Knowledge
title.flavour text: Understanding leads to mastery.

title.name: Fragment of Purification
title.flavour text: Corruption is purged, not cleansed.

title.name: Fragment of Shape
title.flavour text: Beauty is in the eye of the creator.

title.name: Fragment of Terror
title.flavour text: Fear drives survival.

title.name: Fragment of the Chimera
title.flavour text: Enter the crucible. The nexus of nothingness and equilibrium of eternity.

title.name: Fragment of the Hydra
title.flavour text: Enter the crucible. The nexus of nothingness and equilibrium of eternity.

title.name: Fragment of the Minotaur
title.flavour text: Enter the crucible. The nexus of nothingness and equilibrium of eternity.

title.name: Fragment of the Phoenix
title.flavour text: Enter the crucible. The nexus of nothingness and equilibrium of eternity.

title.name: Gift to the Goddess
title.flavour text: The Goddess abides a kingdom beyond compare, should you meet her challenge.

title.name: Gilded Abyss Scarab
title.flavour text: The Winter of the World has ended at the hands of the Three Sisters. We lay this scarab upon your ancient grave in thanks for your efforts, Honoured Founder. As you hoped, the fate of your people will never befall another.

title.name: Gilded Ambush Scarab
title.flavour text: Master Warrior Rindwik fell to one opponent alone: old age. Only the greatest soldiers can say as much.

title.name: Gilded Bestiary Scarab
title.flavour text: The Order was your clan in life, Agnar, Beastmaster, but the First Ones call back their favoured son. The gift of their Visions will pass to another.

title.name: Gilded Blight Scarab
title.flavour text: Be at rest, Blightmaster Dhunan, on the distant shores of your home. A dangerous expedition, but one worthy for he who gave his life to cleanse Wraeclast.

title.name: Gilded Breach Scarab
title.flavour text: Omid, Master Researcher, has left a final commandment upon his death: the world must never know.

title.name: Gilded Cartography Scarab
title.flavour text: Betucia, Bearer of the Sealing Blade, the Order of the Djinn survives because of your sacrifice, but will be forever wounded by your loss.

title.name: Gilded Divination Scarab
title.flavour text: Your centuries of service have been invaluable to us, Narumoa. Go now, return to Hinekora, and join your ancient kin in the halls of the dead.

title.name: Gilded Elder Scarab
title.flavour text: Egrin of the Dark Between Stars, Forger of the Sealing Blade, let your name be redeemed by your unexpected sacrifice.

title.name: Gilded Expedition Scarab
title.flavour text: We lay you to rest in the forest deep, Runesmith Revna, so that you may be forever hidden from the stars which so terrified you in your final days. May the secret you took to your grave be lifted from your burdens.

title.name: Gilded Harbinger Scarab
title.flavour text: For your valour beyond the Gate, Sarina Titucius, we honour you with the first Gilded Scarab awarded while its recipient still lives. Remain vigilant.

title.name: Gilded Legion Scarab
title.flavour text: Given the fate of Deacon Eutychus and the men under Cardinal Sanctus Vox, let none dare the Domain, lest they too feed that vile hunger eternal.

title.name: Gilded Metamorph Scarab
title.flavour text: There was a man of bone, rotting flesh, and weeping black, but his name, his ill-gotten knowledge, and his role in the Order shall be stricken from memory.

title.name: Gilded Reliquary Scarab
title.flavour text: Go to your rest now, Sumei, Master Lorekeeper. The Order shall keep contained the terrible secret that burdened your final years.

title.name: Gilded Shaper Scarab
title.flavour text: Qianga of the Stars, Deliverer of the Sealing Blade to the Watchers, go now, and let your half-dreamt life be troubled by nightmares of achromic hunger no more.

title.name: Gilded Sulphite Scarab
title.flavour text: Let him not be called Raethan the Betrayer. His discovery was too important to keep locked away. Now, for good or ill, it is in civilisation's hands.

title.name: Gilded Torment Scarab
title.flavour text: Though you were swallowed by your own darkness, you saved countless others from eternal misery, young Tsarsk. You were not nothing, as you feared.

title.name: Inya's Key
title.flavour text: The Infinite Mind, unbound by the tethers of sanity, whose thirst for knowledge is all-consuming, whose every word stands our hair on end.

title.name: Mortal Grief
title.flavour text: When we prostrate ourselves to the night, we worship mortality.

title.name: Mortal Hope
title.flavour text: Look to our Queen, for she will lead us from the darkness.

title.name: Mortal Ignorance
title.flavour text: It is only the blind who can live in darkness.

title.name: Mortal Rage
title.flavour text: We are but dogs, howling at an uncaring moon.

title.name: Offering to the Goddess
title.flavour text: It is time for the Goddess to give her final verdict. Your fate rests in her even hands.

title.name: Polished Abyss Scarab
title.flavour text: Your golems and your leadership have slowed the tide of death, Clayshaper. The relics of power you bid us find have kept the Vastiri Plains from the brink of oblivion. The defences of the Maraketh will hold.

title.name: Polished Ambush Scarab
title.flavour text: Your people were renegades, Rindwik, but you have proven your loyalty. You will lead the martial defence of our expeditions.

title.name: Polished Bestiary Scarab
title.flavour text: None among us understand the beasts of this world better than you, honoured Agnar. You will root out the mysteries of wild-artefacts.

title.name: Polished Blight Scarab
title.flavour text: For using the techniques of your homeland to contain the fungal plague, honoured Dhunan, you shall lead the war to eliminate it and end the century-cycle of infestation.

title.name: Polished Breach Scarab
title.flavour text: We task you, honoured Omid, with the investigation of this mysterious 'Xoph' and artefacts related to rifts in the boundaries of our world.

title.name: Polished Cartography Scarab
title.flavour text: For your loyalty and valour, honoured Betucia, we are proud to put the requisition of dream-artefacts in your capable hands.

title.name: Polished Divination Scarab
title.flavour text: Though your peers fear you, Narumoa, the elders have decided that your second sight is ideal for handling all artefacts that seek to subvert Fate.

title.name: Polished Elder Scarab
title.flavour text: Speaker of unclean truths, Egrin of the Dark Between Stars. We curse you whose soul echoes the madness of the void!

title.name: Polished Expedition Scarab
title.flavour text: As you delve into the mysteries of this world, apprentice Revna, remember to learn from the past, not be consumed by it.

title.name: Polished Harbinger Scarab
title.flavour text: For deciphering the language of the inscrutable ones, honoured Sarina, we charge you with investigating their intent in our land.

title.name: Polished Legion Scarab
title.flavour text: As our hand in the Chamber, we grant you, Deacon Eutychus, access to a domain we lack the resources to explore.

title.name: Polished Metamorph Scarab
title.flavour text: As you explore the vast well of human darkness, Saresh, our Surgeon of the Dead, remember that the price can sometimes exceed the value of knowledge.

title.name: Polished Reliquary Scarab
title.flavour text: As the best of our lorekeepers, honoured Sumei, it is now your task to investigate the mysterious duplication of artefacts of power.

title.name: Polished Shaper Scarab
title.flavour text: Bold dreamer, Qianga of the Stars, she of the Celestial Cold! These titles we bestow upon the one among us whose soul speaks to the ineffable.

title.name: Polished Sulphite Scarab
title.flavour text: For harnessing and controlling the power of lightning, you, Raethan, are now charged with researching this new energy.

title.name: Polished Torment Scarab
title.flavour text: Your tortured soul long kept you isolated from your peers, Tsarsk, but has attracted new kindred in kind. You are tasked with appeasing these anguished spirits.

title.name: Rusted Abyss Scarab
title.flavour text: As the hordes of bone and blood and foul magic surge across the Vastiri Plains, the scant survivors of our akhara agree to your alliance, ash-scarred Ahkeli. Disorder means death. Order may mean life.

title.name: Rusted Ambush Scarab
title.flavour text: Your outlaw camp abandoned you when their surprise attack failed, young Rindwik. Now that you know we exist, we cannot let you go. You have two choices.

title.name: Rusted Bestiary Scarab
title.flavour text: Feuding Ezomytes slaughtered your kin, young Agnar, but we pulled you from the flames. The Order of the Djinn is your clan now.

title.name: Rusted Blight Scarab
title.flavour text: We pulled you from the raging ocean, young Dhunan, but we cannot return you to your home. The Order of the Djinn offers you a place on Wraeclast.

title.name: Rusted Breach Scarab
title.flavour text: The Ember-dwellers sought to throw you to their volcanic god, young Omid, but we caught you instead. The Order of the Djinn is your tribe now.

title.name: Rusted Cartography Scarab
title.flavour text: Consider yourself an orphaned Eternal no longer, young Betucia. The Order of the Djinn is your family now.

title.name: Rusted Divination Scarab
title.flavour text: You were a casualty of callous Karui warfare, ageless Narumoa, but the Order mended your wounds. You are bound to us now by your own code.

title.name: Rusted Elder Scarab
title.flavour text: Your visions led the Azmeri down into a world left abandoned by the Vaal. They cast you out, young Egrin, but the Order of the Djinn accepts you.

title.name: Rusted Expedition Scarab
title.flavour text: Your people no longer walk this continent, young Revna, but the Order of the Djinn will give you a new home.

title.name: Rusted Harbinger Scarab
title.flavour text: Your ancestry has been much maligned by history, young Sarina Titucius, but to the Order of the Djinn, you are born anew.

title.name: Rusted Legion Scarab
title.flavour text: Your faith and our Order are not in opposition, young Eutychus.  Let this be the start of a new era of cooperation.

title.name: Rusted Metamorph Scarab
title.flavour text: Rejected even by the Faridun outcasts, young Saresh, you were cursed to walk the white sands until we found you. The Order shall command your penance now.

title.name: Rusted Reliquary Scarab
title.flavour text: The Maraketh left you to die alone in the desert, young Sumei, but we saw the potential in you. The Order of the Djinn is your akhara now.

title.name: Rusted Shaper Scarab
title.flavour text: The Peak-dwellers saw you as impure, young Qianga, but the Order of the Djinn sees you as all the stronger for your uniqueness.

title.name: Rusted Sulphite Scarab
title.flavour text: As the first Brinerot to join the Order, you have much to prove, young Raethan. We are confident you will succeed.

title.name: Rusted Torment Scarab
title.flavour text: Young Tsarsk, you were a broken and forgotten child lying glassy-eyed in a flesh-pit in Trarthus, but the Order found and cleansed you.

title.name: Sacred Blossom
title.flavour text: It isn't the twisted transformative power of corruption that makes it so dangerous. It is its ability to hide in plain sight.

title.name: Sacrifice at Dawn
title.flavour text: Only those who aspire can dare to hope.

title.name: Sacrifice at Dusk
title.flavour text: The Vaal shall never fear the setting of our sun.

title.name: Sacrifice at Midnight
title.flavour text: Look to our Queen, for she will lead us into the light.

title.name: Sacrifice at Noon
title.flavour text: The light without pales in comparison to the light within.

title.name: Simulacrum
title.flavour text: How do you defeat that which dwells within you?

title.name: The Maven's Writ
title.flavour text: It would be foolish to obey the Maven's demands. It would also be foolish not to.

title.name: Tribute to the Goddess
title.flavour text: You may appeal to the Goddess for another verdict, but justice favours only the truly worthy.

title.name: Veritania's Crest
title.flavour text: She sought to bring salvation, but lost her compassion.

title.name: Volkuur's Key
title.flavour text: She of Many Bodies, whose very flesh unites all, whose dark whispers draw forth our souls, unfettered.

title.name: Winged Abyss Scarab
title.flavour text: The Abyssals creep forth by night and by storm. Their eons underground were not a respite, but an amassing, and now they number beyond comprehension.

title.name: Winged Ambush Scarab
title.flavour text: In the absence of a strong martial presence, the renegades rise once more. Their poisons threaten to cloud the land.

title.name: Winged Bestiary Scarab
title.flavour text: Without an experienced Beastmaster to find them new realms, the First Ones' ravaging hunt brings them ever closer to Wraeclast.

title.name: Winged Blight Scarab
title.flavour text: The fungal plague returns, and its roots have adapted. The undiscovered Blightheart that Dhunan theorised must still exist somewhere, yet none remain with the skill to see to its destruction.

title.name: Winged Breach Scarab
title.flavour text: The Master Researcher's final commandment has failed. The High Templar has seen the truth of our situation, and the world will be undone by his fear.

title.name: Winged Cartography Scarab
title.flavour text: The Sealing Blade has been removed, and the agent of Decay shall feed upon this world until nothing remains but dust.

title.name: Winged Divination Scarab
title.flavour text: Hinekora has sent the world another herald, but this hatungo walks another path. We are left blinded, and subject to the vagaries of Fate.

title.name: Winged Elder Scarab
title.flavour text: We are all equally fools for our childish notions. That dread force Decay cannot be defeated by self-sacrifice.

title.name: Winged Expedition Scarab
title.flavour text: Darkness surges in the shadows of the past. Ancient evils stir. The stars watch, forever aloof, forever menacing. None remain who know the secret, so we are defenseless in the face of the unknown.

title.name: Winged Harbinger Scarab
title.flavour text: The thousand year truce has faltered, for the inscrutable ones have imprisoned their own God. Should they invade again, there will be no warning.

title.name: Winged Legion Scarab
title.flavour text: As the passage between Wraeclast and the land beyond time's reach is torn open, we stand on the precipice of eternal war. And no one remains to hold us back.

title.name: Winged Metamorph Scarab
title.flavour text: Though the Necromancer of Weeping Black fell in the desert by the hand of Garukhan, his mindless legions remain scattered throughout Wraeclast, with no master to curb their hunger.

title.name: Winged Reliquary Scarab
title.flavour text: The books were burned, and the scribes set themselves aflame. What secret so terrible could they have discovered? Though centuries have passed, we must investigate this for ourselves.

title.name: Winged Shaper Scarab
title.flavour text: The Watchers have gone silent, yet they scream still. Something lurks among the stars of our dreams, knocking at the door, whispering with the voices of long lost friends...

title.name: Winged Sulphite Scarab
title.flavour text: Madness marches in machine form. Harnessed lightning, grim faces, and cold ambition abounds. Civilisation will be its own undoing.

title.name: Winged Torment Scarab
title.flavour text: Without a speaker of the dead, the countless anguished spirits only grow in number. They have no voice, and no hope. The sun darkens with each passing year.

title.name: Yriel's Key
title.flavour text: Lord of the Wild, of the feral and frenzied, of the uncivilized, the untamed, the untouched.
